name: ZUKERMAN Moshe
research interest: 2018 onwards, Member of the Editorial Board of Sensors.
2018 onwards, Member of the Editorial Board of PLOS ONE.
2017 onwards, Member of the Editorial Board of Journal of Communications and Information Networks.
2009 onwards, Member of the Editorial Board of Computer Communications.
1997-2008, Member of the Editorial Board of the International Journal of Communication Systems.
2001-2008, Member of the Editorial Board of the IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking.
1999-2003, Member of the Editorial Board of Computer Networks.
1992-1996, Editor, the Australian Telecommunication Research Journal.
1996-1997, Guest Editor for the IEEE JSAC on Future Voice Technologies.
1998-2000, Lead Editor for the IEEE JSAC on Analysis and Synthesis of MAC Protocols.
2000-2003, Wireless Communications Series Editor for the IEEE Communications Magazine.
